sense.gloss: robes and a bowl (monk's key possessions auctioned off at his funeral), transmission of the dharma from master to disciple (in Zen)
folded or rolled head towel, towel twisted around one's head
religious mendicancy, asking for alms, monk's begging
going with one's bowl to the meditation hall at mealtime (in a Zen temple)
